name: OK GROW!
description:
We build apps using the same process that the most innovative digital companies like Uber and AirBnB use today.  Lean and agile development allows us to reduce waste by focusing on outcomes that we know will be valuable to your customer.
We build world-class applications for our clients that drive brand advocacy through a tailored platform designed for early product adoption and value-driven user growth.   
The team we have in house are all seasoned product designers and developers.  They are expert at working alongside your team to conceptualize the perfect product for iOS, web and Android.   Our developers can release for all platforms with 1 codebase; powerful and efficient.
Clients are assigned a tailored product team that is the best fit with your application objectives and target market.
The product team helps conceptualize, design and develop your product.  Post-launch we offer the expertise of a product manager who can analyze your application usage metrics and create actionable insights for product improvement and feature roll-out. 
If your long-term strategy is to move development in-house, we offer full knowledge transfer and succession planning. 
Lets talk about your project today: hello@okgrow.com
